column1:
MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
What's up, {{c1::Calamander}}?
どうしたんだ、カマンダー？
[sound:1754722474862.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix propn "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
All this ancient symbolism stuff is kinda my {{c1::jam}}.
これらの古代の象徴的なものは、私の得意分野なんです。
[sound:1754722331147.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
What's this {{c1::peacock}}?
この孔雀は何？
[sound:1754722294962.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
but the new doorbell kicks ass.
{{c1::Oh, you're crushing it.::ああ、君は素晴らしいよ。}}
[ Book thuds ]
[sound:1754722282932.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
and Chloe summoned this massive burp.
{{c1::I mean, like, the mother of all belches.::つまり、すべてのげっぷの母のようなものです。}}
Everyone was laughing, but my mom was like, "Chloe,"
[sound:1754722186160.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
not living up to my potential,
{{c1::and Chloe summoned this massive burp.::そしたらクロエが、ものすごいげっぷをしたんだ。}}
I mean, like, the mother of all belches.
[sound:1754722169668.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
But God, she was {{c1::bossy}}.
でも、なんていうか、仕切りたがり屋だった。
[sound:1754722118581.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix adj "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
There's a memorial in her {{c1::honor}} where she died,
彼女が亡くなった場所に、追悼碑がある。
[sound:1754721774935.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
from a scientific standpoint, has changed.
{{c1::I am neck-deep in it.::私はそれにどっぷり浸かっている。}}
This is exactly where I want to be.
[sound:1754721705779.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
and then threw a {{c1::brick}} through our window.
窓にレンガを投げ込んできた。
[sound:1754721664245.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
Dark lightning?
{{c1::I can't prove it, but it tracks.::証明はできないけど、それっぽい。}}
Zeke said he felt something like an earthquake.
[sound:1754721586224.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
Okay.
{{c1::Starting now, it's a wide-open book between you and me.::これから、あなたと私の間には隠し事はありません。}}
No more secrets. Deal?
[sound:1754721332025.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
Man: {{c1::Freaks}}!
男：変人ども！
[sound:1754720987845.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿13﻿: 進入許可
Nope. No family.
{{c1::Tale as old as time.::いつものお話。}}
Someone then? Friends, co-workers?
[sound:1754720623757.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

10,000 Calorie Challenge On A Plane
bread absolutely {{c1::devour}} and Scarlet what did
パンがもう 1 斤、食べ尽くされました。 スカーレット、今何だって
"word-naked lang-en youtube num "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿12﻿: 消失点
Yeah, no {{c1::biggie}}.
ええ、たいしたことないですよ。
[sound:1754711293159.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿11﻿: 飛行機雲
Does that normally work on your dad?
{{c1::-No. -Gimme some credit, buddy.::－いいや。－少しは信用しろよ、相棒。}}
[ Knock on door ]
[sound:1754653068290.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿11﻿: 飛行機雲
Love you, kiddo. -Olive! Guess what.
{{c1::I got to have Hungry Man.::ハングリーマンを手に入れなきゃ。}}
[ Sighs ]
[sound:1754652348308.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
because I am a giant {{c1::wrecking}} ball smashing into your life.
君の人生に突っ込んでいく巨大な破壊の球だからだ。
[sound:1754646022302.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix verb "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Why didn't you come to the {{c1::hangar}} when the plane came back?
飛行機が戻ってきたとき、なぜ格納庫に来なかったんだ？
[sound:1754646006962.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Hate to ruin your party of one.
{{c1::Get the hell out of here, Stone.::ストーン、ここから出ていけ。}}
I get it -- you blame me for Vance's death.
[sound:1754645166304.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
He was {{c1::abusive}}.
彼は虐待的でした。
[sound:1754645069496.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix adj "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Are you trying to {{c1::ditch}} me now?
今私を追い出そうとしてるの？
[sound:1754568548534.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix verb "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
the Major on that {{c1::chopper}} was a woman.
ヘリに乗っていた少佐は女性だった。
[sound:1754568406673.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
A {{c1::senator}} said, "It's the Holy Grail.
上院議員は「それは聖杯だ。
[sound:1754568331936.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
But all my source had was a {{c1::fragment}}
しかし、私の情報源にあったのは断片だけだった
[sound:1754568318250.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
To pay for a {{c1::clandestine}} operation.
秘密作戦の費用を賄うためです。
[sound:1754568293047.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix num "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Are you positive the Major is a woman?
{{c1::Yeah. That a big deal?::ああ。それが問題か？}}
It just might be. Thank you.
[sound:1754568208666.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
I mean, I was, but he seemed so {{c1::aggro}}.
いや、してたんだけど、彼はすごく攻撃的だったから。
[sound:1754568207620.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix adv "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Riojas signed off on me investigating it.
{{c1::Okay. Bring me up to speed.::わかりました。状況を教えてください。}}
Uh, he's an attorney, serious money.
[sound:1754568039670.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
It's the wife of one of the {{c1::detainees}}.
逮捕された一人、その妻なんだ。
[sound:1754568015813.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
And, uh, I wanted to talk to you.
{{c1::Later, okay? I'm hot on this missing-persons thing.::後でね、いい？この失踪事件にはもう夢中なんだ。}}
It's the wife of one of the detainees.
[sound:1754568001166.mp3] "phrase lang-en netflix "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Yeah. That a big {{c1::deal}}?

[sound:1754567885588.mp3] "word-naked lang-en netflix noun "

MANIFEST/マニフェスト エ﻿ピ﻿ソ﻿ー﻿ド﻿10﻿: 横風
Sorry. I wasn't {{c1::eavesdropping}}.
ごめん。盗み聞きなんてしてないよ。

Sounds like complete {{c1::amnesia}}.

おいしい。

And at the time, it just seemed like a way

to take the {{c1::reins}} of something, anything, you know?
